app.description: License and test set assets management website.

summary.title: Summary
summary.float-license: Click to float the licenses for this test set.

testset-cards.selectedtip: Choose the test set you want to release the license.
testset-cards.partnumbertip: The license you are about to release.

generic.release-conflict-warning: {{partNumber}} required {{requiredPartNumber}}, you should release {{partNumber}} as well , or its function would be invalid.
generic.assign-conflict-warning: You could not assign {{partNumber}} and {{conflict}} in the same test set.
generic.release-warning: Are you sure to release {{partNumber}} from {{serialNumber}} ?
generic.assign-warning: Are you sure to assign {{partNumber}} to {{serialNumber}} ?

assignedhyperlinkrender.floatinglicense: Click to release assigned license which is tied to a specific test set, will move this license to "Available" license pool.

availablehyperlinkrender.floatinglicense: Click to assign license to a specific test set ,will move this license to "Assigned" license pool.

release-stepper.connecttestset: The final step is to connect server with your test set({{serialNumber}}), and check, then these assigned licenses will be returned to the avaliable license pool.

resolveconflicts.title: Resolve Conflicts
resolveconflicts.about2release: Resolve the conflicts before releasing {{partNumber}} from {{serialNumber}}.
resolveconflicts.markasresovled: Mark all the conflicts as resolved.

confirmchanges.title: Confirm Changes
confirmchanges.releaseconfirm: You about to release these licenses from {{serialNumber}}, please check the list below and confirm the changes.

float-confirm.change-bundle: Click to change the License Bundle

float-stepper.connect-testset: The final step is to connect server with your test set({{serialNumber}}), and check.

confirm-changes.title: Confirm Changes
confirm-changes.info: You about to float licenses for {{serialNumber}}, please check the list below and confirm the changes.

tips.activated: License have been activated in test set.
tips.assigned: License have been assigned to test set, wait for test set to check.
tips.licensed: License have been permanent activated in test set, please check the offline code.
tips.releasing: Releasing the license, wait for test set to check.
tips.idle: Available license, could be assigned to test set.
tips.not-purchased: You haven't purchased that license yet, please contact VeEX sales engineer.

label.changeorgscope: You could only see one specific Company/Group 's data, click to switch to another Company/Group.
label.changeproductfamily: License is only allowed to float between the same type of product, click to switch to another type.

not-found.title: 404 Page Not Found
not-found.description: The page you were looking for doesn't exist

app.title: VeExpress
